quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Every time I bring up missing evidence, they act like it’s news to them.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and that’s why I’ve asked them to confirm what they do and don’t have on record.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: But we’ve been through this so many times. It shouldn’t keep disappearing.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I agree, it shouldn’t. I’ve told them that as well.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Then why do they keep asking me to resubmit?

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: That’s part of the problem, and I’ve raised it as a serious issue.

contradictions.issue: Evidence repeatedly reported as missing; police act unaware; victim asked to resubmit
